document_data.mainbody:
heamont was a satyr who dwelled within the Chondalwood forest during the late 15 century DR. He was one among the group living in the Chondalwood referred to as the "forest children".
He was rather tall for a satyr, with a narrow but rugged-looking face.
In Nightal of the , Theamont encountered three humans traveling through his forest, one of whom was the chosen of the goddess Sune. At the behest of the Forest Queen Mielikki, Theamont escorted them through the forest along the Forest Way.
